pages.text: $(li)The Soul Salt Clump can be used to craft the $(l)Charged Chiseled Soul Slate Brick$(), $(l)Charged Chiseled Soul Stone Brick$() and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/infernalexp/cured_jerky)Cured Jerky$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/infernal_expansion/embody)Embodies$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
